data.title: Blog Baladi
data.text:
Lebanon To Impose Visa Restrictions On Syrians For The First Time

Picture via UNRWA Syrians were able to stay in Lebanon for up to six months previously, but this will no longer be possible as any Syrian who wishes to enter Lebanon will have to obtain a visa at the borders. This measure should have been implemented long time ago in order to control the flow of refugees trying to escape the war but it's better late than never. The new regulations will come into effect…

Will Solidere Really End In 2019?

Update: Solidere's term was actually extended to 35 years in 2005, so its term ends in 2029 not 2019 as is being said, open to extension. via Karl We all know that the St Georges Club in Beirut and Solidere are not friends, and it seems the St Georges is optimistic that Solidere will come to an end in 2019. The reason why they are saying so is because Solidere was created in 1994 and…
